alert.note: Alert for Morton; Stanton; Stevens (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 12 at 5:52PM CDT by NWS Dodge City
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Morton, southwestern Stevens and Stanton Counties through 615 PM CDT... At 552 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Two Buttes to 8 miles south of Stonington to 11 miles southwest of Elkhart. Movement was northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Elkhart around 610 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of these storms include Richfield and Wilburton. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM CDT for southwestern Kansas.
